medical_history.chief_complaint: Localized right lower quadrant abdominal pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports a one day history of first diffuse then localized right lower quadrant abdominal pain. There is associated nausea but no vomiting or change in bowel habits or urinary function.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diverticulitis status post elective sigmoid colectomy with complications including intraabdominal abscess requiring washout, colostomy, drainage and subsequent takedown of colostomy, and stapled coloproctostomy.
medical_history.family_history: Father with hypertension and diverticular disease; paternal aunt with diverticular disease.
